abstract: The move accompanied a report detailing troubling practices inside many of the facilities.
snippet: The move accompanied a report detailing troubling practices inside many of the facilities.
lead_paragraph: Apple released a list of its major suppliers for the first time on Friday, bringing the company up to par with other big American corporations, including Hewlett-Packard, Intel and Nike, which have released similar lists.

headline.main: Apple Lists Its Suppliers for 1st Time
headline.print_headline: Apple Lists Its Suppliers For 1st Time

byline.original: By Nick Wingfield and Charles Duhigg
